AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling, transported through South Texas with inadequate water and food
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IIRIRA: Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996, related to alien smuggling offense sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.House Conference Report No. 104-863: a report related to alien smuggling offense sentencing, detailing the imposition of sentencing enhancements for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the smuggling incident occurred, imposing sentencing enhancements for alien smuggling offenses
